Entities.Name: SEDATION

Entities.Name: SEDATIONLEVEL
Entities.Definition: Describes the level of sedation used during the procedure.

Entities.Definition: Names of drugs used for sedation or the procedure.

Entities.Name: DOSAGE

Entities.Name: ANTISPASMODICS
Entities.Definition: Indicates whether antispasmodic agents were used.

Entities.Name: DEVICE
Entities.Definition: Endoscopic equipment used during the procedure.

Entities.Name: EXTENT

Entities.Name: LESION

Entities.Name: SHAPE
Entities.Definition: Describes the morphological shape of the lesion.

Entities.Name: COLOR
Entities.Definition: Color characteristic of the finding or lesion.

Entities.Name: SIZE
Entities.Definition: Measured size of the lesion or abnormality.

Entities.Name: NUMBER
Entities.Definition: Indicates the quantity of lesions or polyps found.

Dataset.Name: Samsung Medical Center Colonoscopy Report Corpus
Dataset.Description: A corpus of 280,668 colonoscopy reports (2000â€“2015), with 5,000 manually annotated for named entity recognition (NER). Annotations were performed using the DOCCANO tool, with input from clinical experts.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were based on results from the DARWIN-C project using DOCCANO. Labels were assigned for both procedural information and colonoscopic findings. Discontinuous entities were handled by grouping or separating depending on structure. The output was formatted using IOB2.
